forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: posted to wrong board

comments.text: i made a post in showcase called problem object. i was thinking it was the only board people could post objects to. i'm thinking now that may not be the case. sorry!
no worries, and can you pls share that problem object here?
i pasted it on the other board. when i pulled it from that board the unwanted part was gone. i deleted the original from my i ventory and replaced with the fixed version .
same with this one. boards are a cure all for objects with extra parts
